divs: sighting detailsmy 16 year old daughter and her friend were sitting outside on the patio. the weather was hot and the sky was clear. they noticed a flash that lit up the sky like lightning. when they looked up they saw a large deep blue sphere dropping from high in the sky down behind the house. it had a blue, green, white glow or halo around it. they could'nt tell if it was 1\2 a mile or 100 miles away. it was the size of a marble from where they sat. it was moving very fast. it did not make a sound. i asked if it had been an exploding transformer or a light falling from the nearby football stadium and they said it started high in the air . they thought it was an airplane but it was too large and it was a deep blue sphere.
